titles.title: Help Hospitals Recover Act of 2005

To provide for relief payments to private and public hospitals that temporarily ceased to operate because of a mandatory evacuation order issued in anticipation of Hurricane Rita, and for other purposes.
Help Hospitals Recover Act of 2005

bill.summary: Help Hospitals Recover Act of 2005 - Directs the Director of the Federal Emeregency Management Agency to make a described payment to each private or public hospital that temporarily ceased to operate because of a mandatory evacuation order issued in anticipation of Hurricane Rita.
